arguments.value: Create a new soap request for the getCreditCard(String id) operation.
arguments.raw: Create a new soap request for the getCreditCard(String id) operation.

arguments.value:
A soap request uses the following HTTP header:
SOAPAction: some action header, can be ""

The soap message body has the following format:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
  <SOAP-ENV:Envelope xmlns:SOAP-ENV='http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/' xmlns:xsd='http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema' xmlns:xsi='http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance'>
    <SOAP-ENV:Body>
      <ns1:getCreditCard SOAP-ENV:encodingStyle='http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/' xmlns:ns1='http://lessons'>
        <id xsi:type='xsd:string'>101</id>
      </ns1:getCreditCard>
    </SOAP-ENV:Body>
  </SOAP-ENV:Envelope>
arguments.raw:
A soap request uses the following HTTP header:
SOAPAction: some action header, can be ""

The soap message body has the following format:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
  <SOAP-ENV:Envelope xmlns:SOAP-ENV='http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/' xmlns:xsd='http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema' xmlns:xsi='http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance'>
    <SOAP-ENV:Body>
      <ns1:getCreditCard SOAP-ENV:encodingStyle='http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/' xmlns:ns1='http://lessons'>
        <id xsi:type='xsd:string'>101</id>
      </ns1:getCreditCard>
    </SOAP-ENV:Body>
  </SOAP-ENV:Envelope>
